data.meta_description: Buy J'Accuse (1919) On DVD today! Rare classic Silent Films film Starring Marise Dauvray, Severin-Mars, Romuald Joube
data.text:
Actor : Marise Dauvray, Severin-Mars, Romuald Joube

Director: Abel Gance

Genre: Silent Films

Year: 1919

Studio: Flicker Alley

Length: 166

Released: September 16, 2008

Rating: Unrated (Video)

Format: DVD

Misc: Black & White

Language:English

Subtitles : English

DESCRIPTION:

Romuald Joub‚, S‚verin-Mars, Maryse Dauvray. One of cinema's silent masterpieces by French film pioneer Abel Gance was done in the vein of an anti-war statement. This post-WWI epic dramatizes the tale of two men and one woman whose lives are tragically complicated by the horrors of the world's first global conflict. In French with English subtitles. Silent. 2 DVDs. 1919/b&w/166 min/NR/fullscreen.
